channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 23rd April
item.description:
28day with 2 way stop and go plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level difference 500 x 300 x 20mm tarmac patch required stats required (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet
